name: Neptune Real Estate
author: Fortisthemes

sections.description:
Netune Real estate is a free WordPress plugin that lets you create and manage real estate properties. This plugin was built to work with the free Neptune Real Estate Theme

Want More Features?

we’ve built a pro version of this plugin that let’s you do a lot more:

  • Builder page with dynamic sections
  • list properties by location,type (sale/rental)
  • Add and assign agents to the properties
  • Use google maps
  • Property Videos & Floor plans
  • List Agents/Teams
  • Search Property
  • One-On-One email support

Links

  • Upgrade To PRO for just $69
  • Free Version DEMO
  • Premium Version DEMO
  • Documentation
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload neptune-real-estate.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where can I download the free theme

The free theme is currently under review and it will be avaible sometime in September, in the mean time you can download it from here

Where can i get the PRO version

You can get the pro version from our website for just $69 here

how to set up the plugin
